page.title: 18Eating Out
page.content: Sometimes at weekends we go out for a meal. We often go to the Chinese Restaurant. When we get there the man takes our coats and then we sit down. The waiter comes and asks us what we would like to eat. I have Chop Suey, Prawn Crackers and Spare Ribs. My brother has Chicken, Fried Rice, Spare Ribs and Chop Suey. We put Soya Sauce on our meal. Soya Sauce is like brown sauce and vinegar mixed together. It is nice. It takes a long time to get the meal ready because they cook it in a special way.
